<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script">
    <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <abort_action>false</abort_action>
        <access>package_private</access>
        <action_delete>false</action_delete>
        <action_insert>true</action_insert>
        <action_query>false</action_query>
        <action_update>true</action_update>
        <active>true</active>
        <add_message>false</add_message>
        <advanced>true</advanced>
        <change_fields>false</change_fields>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <collection>cmdb_ci_information_object</collection>
        <condition/>
        <description/>
        <execute_function>false</execute_function>
        <filter_condition table="cmdb_ci_information_object">classificationVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="classification" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/>
            <item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/>
        </filter_condition>
        <is_rest>false</is_rest>
        <message/>
        <name>Data Classificaition Syncing</name>
        <order>100</order>
        <priority>100</priority>
        <rest_method/>
        <rest_method_text/>
        <rest_service/>
        <rest_service_text/>
        <rest_variables/>
        <role_conditions/>
        <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {

    oldClassifications = previous.classification.split(",");
    newClassifications = current.classification.split(",");
    for (var i = 0; i < oldClassifications.length; i++) {
        if (!newClassifications.includes(oldClassifications[i])) {
            var newGr = new GlideRecord('cmdb_data_classification_mapping');
            newGr.addQuery("data_classification", oldClassifications[i]);
            newGr.addQuery("information_object", current.sys_id);
            newGr.query();
            if (newGr.next()) {
                newGr.setWorkflow(false);
                newGr.deleteRecord();
            }
        }
    }
    for (var j = 0; j < newClassifications.length; j++) {
        if (!oldClassifications.includes(newClassifications[j])) {
            if (newClassifications[j] != "") {
                var oldGr = new GlideRecord('cmdb_data_classification_mapping');
                oldGr.initialize();
                oldGr.data_classification = newClassifications[j];
                oldGr.information_object = current.sys_id;

                var checkGr = new GlideRecord('cmdb_data_classification_mapping');
                checkGr.addQuery("data_classification", newClassifications[j]);
                checkGr.addQuery("information_object", current.sys_id);
                checkGr.query();
                if (!checkGr.next()){
					checkGr.setWorkflow(false);
                    oldGr.insert();
				}
            }
        }
    }

})(current, previous);]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-04-03 06:00:49</sys_created_on>
        <sys_domain>global</sys_domain>
        <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path>
        <sys_id>2ce4721cff022110f76fc6ff9c3bf148</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Data Classificaition Syncing</sys_name>
        <sys_overrides/>
        <sys_package display_value="Configuration Management (CMDB)" source="com.snc.cmdb">8f64bce83c31311068bcf327dfe37f7e</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_2ce4721cff022110f76fc6ff9c3bf148</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-04-19 06:22:22</sys_updated_on>
        <template/>
        <when>after</when>
    </sys_script>
    <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=2ce4721cff022110f76fc6ff9c3bf148"/>
</record_update>
